english.segment1: What child is this who laid to rest. On Mary's lap is sleeping. Whom angels greet with anthems sweet. While shepherds watch are keeping
english.segment2: This, this is Christ the King. Whom shepherds guard and angels sing. Haste, haste to bring him laud. The babe, the son of Mary
english.segment3: Why lies he in such mean estate. Where ox and ass are feeding. Good Christian fear, for sinners here. The silent Word is pleading
english.segment4: So bring Him incense, gold, and myrrh. Come peasant king to own Him. The King of kings, salvation brings. Let loving hearts enthrone Him
english.segment5: This, this is Christ the King. Whom shepherds guard and angels sing. Haste, haste to bring him laud. The babe, the son of Mary
